sect2.title: Configuring gcc2
sect2.sect3:
Configuration Information
&library-config;
The instructions given above make compatibility symlinks that pre-compiled packages in BLFS require. You may create additional compatibility links based on your requirements.
If you only need the gcc2 libraries, you may delete /opt/gcc2.
Whenever you need to use gcc2 instead of you system installed compiler, add /opt/gcc2/bin to the front of your PATH before compiling the concerned package.
